name: Yonko Battle (Windows ver.)
description:
A gatcha-style twist on the classic Four-in-a-row game--designed exclusively for Android through the Godot Game Engine. Complete with player customization, voice acting, and online multiplayer. Find your own strategy to connect your way to victory!

Project Lead: Anthony Ellis
Programming & UI: Anthony Ellis, Brandon Ellis, Young Lee
Artists: Michael Igoe, Kaela Chen, Virgilio Tan
Music: Desmond Oliver, Louis Witt
Voice Acting: Alex Holstein, Nithya Prakash, Natalia Mitiuriev, Young Lee
